property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Voltage
property.description: Is the microcontroller 5v or 3.3v.

property.name: Power-Source
property.description: Is the USB device powered via the USB Bus or does it use an external supply.

property.name: Serial-Debug
property.description: Are pins PD2/PD3 as serial RXD/TXD pins for debug output (38400, 8, none, 1)

property.name: HID-Debug
property.description: Is debug through the HID interface enabled.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the microcontroller. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Use Status LEDs
property.description: Use the default AT90USBKey LEDs as indicators of the USB status.

property.name: Use LEDs
property.description: Use the stock AT90USBKey LEDs as device output LEDs. 'Use Status LEDs' must be set to LED1, LED2, or None.

property.name: Use Voltage Monitor
property.description: Use the stock AT90USBKey Voltage Monitor as an analog input.

property.name: Use Temperature Sensor
property.description: Use the stock AT90USBKey Temperature Sensor as an analog input.

property.name: Use Joystick
property.description: Use the stock AT90USBKey Joystick as a directional input.

property.name: SerialNo
property.description: Required unique serial number of the device. This must be unique between all GenericHID devices or MS-Windows will Blue-Screen if two duplicate devices are plugged in!

property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Bits
property.description: ADC resolution the Potentiometer is sampled at.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the potentiometer in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the encoder in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Pullup
property.description: Should the internal pullup resistor of the microcontroller be used. Normally set to "true" when switching to ground.

property.name: Debounce
property.description: Waits for the mechanical switch stop bouncing before registering a switch closure.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the switch in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: UsageMin
property.description: HID usage of the first key. Other keys are number consecutively.

property.name: Rows
property.description: The number of rows in the matrix.

property.name: Columns
property.description: The number of columns in the matrix

property.name: Pullup
property.description: Should the internal pullup resistor of the microcontroller be used. Normally set to "true" when switching to ground.

property.name: Debounce
property.description: Waits for the mechanical switch stop bouncing before registering a switch closure.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the keymatrix in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Outputs
property.description: The number of outputs on the selector switch.

property.name: Pullup
property.description: Should the internal pullup resistor of the microcontroller be used. Normally set to "true" when switching to ground.

property.name: Debounce
property.description: Waits for the mechanical switch stop bouncing before registering a switch closure.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the switch in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Outputs
property.description: The number of outputs on the selector switch.

property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Rows
property.description: The number of rows on the Display.

property.name: Columns
property.description: The number of columns on the Display.

property.name: 8Bit
property.description: The number of data lines to connect to the LCD. If true 8 bits are used. If false, only 4 bits, data lines D4-D7 are used.

property.name: Row1Address
property.description: The start address of row 1.

property.name: Row2Address
property.description: The start address of row 2.

property.name: Row3Address
property.description: The start address of row 3.

property.name: Row4Address
property.description: The start address of row 4.

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the LCD in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.name: Name
property.description: The optional user friendly name given to the control.

property.name: Usage
property.description: HID usage of the control.

property.name: Source
property.description: Does the LED light when the microcontroller outputs a high value "true", or when the microcontroller pulls the port low "false".

property.name: Current
property.description: Current usage of the LED in mA. Used to estimate the USB power draw.

property.description: The number of directions.
